description.name: calculator
description.description: Evaluate the given mathematical expression. It is recommended to be used when there is something to calculate.

expression.description:
The mathematical expression to evaluate, which is consist of float numbers, arithmetics(+, -, *, /, %, ^), parentheses, and functions.
The following mathematical constants and functions can be utilzed in the expression.
[e, pi, sqrt, abs, round, trunc, floor, ceil, ln, log, log10, sin, cos, tan, asin, acos, atan, atan2, sinh, cosh, tanh, fac, ncr, npr]
